name: zil-pay
description: ZilPay browser Extension for zilliqa blockchain

scripts.test: export VUE_CLI_BABEL_TARGET_NODE=true && export VUE_CLI_BABEL_TRANSPILE_MODULES=true && jest --notify --detectOpenHandles --config jest.config.js
scripts.all:firefox: export PLATFORM=firefox && npm run build && npm run scripts && node manifest.js
scripts.all:chrome: export PLATFORM=chrome && npm run build && npm run scripts && node manifest.js
scripts.scripts: npm run content && npm run inpage && npm run background
scripts.build:prod:firefox: export NODE_ENV=production && export PLATFORM=firefox && npm run all
scripts.build:prod:chrome: export NODE_ENV=production && export PLATFORM=chrome && npm run all
